Portal zu spielen hat mir sehr viel spaß gemacht, jedoch das fand ich ein bisschen komisch (Vlt. liegt es an meiner unendeckten Veranlagung für Puzzel Games) hatte ich das Spiel in 2 1/2 Stunden durch.
Das soll jedoch nicht heißen, dass man Portal nicht kaufen sollte, denn es hat mir trotzdem viel Spaß bereitet durch die Interessant gestalteten Level zu flitzen (In meinen Fall)

Also gibt es von mir eine deutliche Kaufempfehlung!

One of the best puzzle games out there. Portal is not only creative, but allows you to think about how to solve each and every chamber; some chambers even have more than one way to solve them, which makes it perfect for future playthroughs.
Overall, the game is fantastic. My only complaint is that it's pretty short, but it can get you some time to finish it if it's the first time you're playing it.

我个人是比较喜欢解谜类的游戏，在接触了一些此类型的游戏后，通关其实倒没有想象的难，但3D眩晕很难。如果把传送门1放在现在，可能没有那么出色。但看时代是07年的作品，在当时确实是令人惊叹，一种原因可能是受科幻题材的影响，空间传送、人工智能这种科学吸引了许多感兴趣的玩家，二是通过空间传送这个解谜方式，加上人工智能的危机，又是一个吸睛的亮点。如果能接受3D眩晕，是值得一玩的，因为到游戏后期，基本上都是在飞，且视角会一直转（呕~）。

Very well designed game that excelled with a concept that was never really touched upon by Valve or its competitors by the late 2000s. It has a great storyline entirely based on one character, the antagonist super-computer GLaDos. It has survived quite well into contempory gaming. 

Lets list many pros and a few cons:

Pros: -Visuals that can still hold up to today
-Controls that, while still a bit dated, mesh well with standard control scheme.
-Good buildup on plot
- Portal Idea and other technological concepts are inspired
-A interesting distance from Valve, a company that usually created leveled FPS games, into a more sci-fi concept.
- Gotta love Applied Physics.
Cons: -Despite its buildup, the plot is still linear, with leveled schemes followed by a boss battle.
- The final level feels less like an escape and more like a hedge maze.
-There is no reason to care for Chell's wellbeing.
-The final race against the clock in the boss battle feels more like a distant limit than a enroaching cutoff conveying any significant urgency.

All in all, great concept and demonstration from the team at Valve, but it had some holes in 2007. Valve took advice and patched much of these in the second installment. Still, this game hold a special place as one of the first of Valve's games I played in my Xbox 360 years.

Original, faire joujou avec un générateur de portail c'est quand même cool, et puis mince le jeu deviendra culte un jour s'il ne l'est pas déjà, certes il a une durée de vie bof bof, mais si vous trouvez le moyen de l'avoir pas cher ça reste un incontournable à posséder.
Il m'a fait découvrir que les jeux taggués comme "puzzle" n'étaient pas forcément chiants.
If you were gonna play one video game, ever, in your life, make it this one.
